review.author: Frontend (Claude Opus)
review.findings: Cross-model review: Bridge tab — new user dashboard in right panel. 3 new files (bridge.js, bridge.css, bridge.test.js) + 4 modified (index.html, tabs.js, tabs.css, renderer.js). Event bus subscription/cleanup correct: wildcards (comms.*, contract.*, inject.*, safemode.*) and destroy() unsubscribes each. tabs.js setupRightPanel signature change matches renderer.js call site. No new IPC needed — bus consumed directly in renderer. innerHTML XSS-safe via escapeHtml. Stream capped at 100. Tests: 18/18 pass. Reviewer (Opus) also approved integration review.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
